price: Daabi, εberε a Nokorε (Qur’aan) no baa wͻn hͻ no, wͻ’annye anni, enti wͻn wͻ tebea bi a wͻ’nnim deε wͻn wͻ mu.
arabic: بَلۡ كَذَّبُواْ بِٱلۡحَقِّ لَمَّا جَآءَهُمۡ فَهُمۡ فِيٓ أَمۡرٖ مَّرِيجٍ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: bal kadhabū bil-ḥaqi lammā jāahum fahum fī amrin marījin
